chat.description: Perform a single-turn chat with AI

grant.description: Grant an access level to the user

check.description: Check the access level of the user

revoke.description: Revoke an access level for the user

fixpy.description: Identify and fix bugs in Python code

errors.command_processing_error: **ERROR** - An error occurred while processing the command
errors.ai_response_generation_failed: **ERROR** - Failed to generate response from AI service
errors.fixpy_command_processing_error: **ERROR** - An error occurred while processing the fixpy command
errors.fixpy_modal_execution_error: **ERROR** - An error occurred while executing the command
errors.chat_command_processing_error: **ERROR** - An error occurred while processing the command

access_control.guild_only_command: This command can only be used in a guild
access_control.user_not_in_guild: The user does not exist in the guild
access_control.grant_access_level_message: Select an access level to grant to the user
access_control.revoke_access_level_message: Select an access level to revoke for the user
access_control.access_level_granted: Access level `{access_level}` has been granted to the user (ID: `{user_id}`)
access_control.access_level_revoked: Access level `{access_level}` has been revoked from the user (ID: `{user_id}`)
access_control.user_does_not_have_access_level: The user (ID: `{user_id}`) does not have the access level `{access_level}`
access_control.user_has_advanced_and_blocked: The user (ID: `{user_id}`) has the access level `advanced` and `blocked`
access_control.user_has_advanced: The user (ID: `{user_id}`) has the access level `advanced`
access_control.user_has_blocked: The user (ID: `{user_id}`) has the access level `blocked`
access_control.user_has_no_access_level: The user (ID: `{user_id}`) does not have any access level
